queryMap.query: SELECT NVL(B.STND_YEAR,?) STND_YEAR ,NVL(B.TMS,1) TMS ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.RMK ,C.PART_CD ,C.PART_NM ,B.CNT ,B.CHK ,A.ORD_NO ,A.CONTENTS FROM TBTQ_SPEC_CD A ,( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT,CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT, 0 CHK FROM TBTQ_CTL -----------------------------------------------------경주편성 프로세스(P02) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS, 'P02' CD ,COUNT(*) CNT,1 CHK FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND A.PAYOFF < 10 AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS -----------------------------------------------------모터보트 정비프로세스(P13) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,'P13' CD,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),2) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.MOT_NO,MAX(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)- MIN(A.INTRO_RUN_TM) AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.MOT_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS -----------------------------------------------------정상경주 이행도(Q01) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q01' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, COUNT(TMS) CNT, 1 CHK FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD IN('002', '003') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) -----------------------------------------------------출발위반율(Q02) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q02' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('110','120') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) -----------------------------------------------------출주제외건수(Q03) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q03' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT ,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('995','996','997') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) -----------------------------------------------------경주사고건수(Q04) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q04' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD IN('001','002','004','007','008','010') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) -----------------------------------------------------스타트타임(Q05) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q05' CD,ROUND(SUM(A.STAR_TM)/COUNT(A.STAR_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS -----------------------------------------------------소개항주(Q06) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q06' CD,ROUND(SUM(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)/COUNT(A.INTRO_RUN_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS -----------------------------------------------------경주흥미도(Q07) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,'Q07' CD,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),3) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO,SUM(A.TIME_DIFF)/2000 AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' AND A.RANK IN( 2,3) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS -----------------------------------------------------경주규칙위반율(Q08) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,'Q08' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE VOIL_CD IN('125','140','150','210','220','999') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS ) WHERE STND_YEAR = ? ) B ,TBTQ_PART_CD C WHERE A.CD = B.CD(+) AND A.PART_CD = C.PART_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------과거 2년 SELECT NVL(B.STND_YEAR,?) STND_YEAR ,B.TMS ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.RMK ,C.PART_CD ,C.PART_NM ,B.CNT ,B.CHK ,A.ORD_NO ,A.CONTENTS FROM TBTQ_SPEC_CD A ,( SELECT STND_YEAR, TMS, CD, CNT, CHK FROM( SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,CD,SUM(CNT) CNT, 0 CHK FROM TBTQ_CTL GROUP BY STND_YEAR,CD -----------------------------------------------------경주편성의 적절도(P02) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0 TMS, 'P02' CD ,COUNT(*) CNT,1 CHK FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND A.PAYOFF < 10 AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------모터보트 관리프로세스(P13) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'P13',ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),2) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.MOT_NO,MAX(A.INTRO_RUN_TM) - MIN(A.INTRO_RUN_TM) AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.MOT_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------정상경주진행실적(Q01) UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q01', NVL(CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD IN('002', '003') GROUP BY STND_YEAR )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,B.CNT -----------------------------------------------------출발위만율(Q02) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q02' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('110','120') GROUP BY STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------출주제외건수(Q03) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q03' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT ,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('995','996','997') GROUP BY STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------경주사고건수(Q04) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q04' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD IN('001','002','004','007','008','010') GROUP BY STND_YEAR ----------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q05' CD,ROUND(SUM(A.STAR_TM)/COUNT(A.STAR_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR ----------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q06' CD,ROUND(SUM(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)/COUNT(A.INTRO_RUN_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------경주흥미도(Q07) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q07',ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),3) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO,SUM(A.TIME_DIFF)/2000 AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' AND A.RANK IN( 2,3) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR -----------------------------------------------------경주규칙위반율(Q08) UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0 TMS,'Q08' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE VOIL_CD IN('125','140','150','210','220','999') GROUP BY STND_YEAR )WHERE STND_YEAR BETWEEN ? - 2 AND ? ) B ,TBTQ_PART_CD C WHERE A.CD = B.CD AND A.PART_CD = C.PART_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ORD_NO, CD ,STND_YEAR,TMS

SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,CD,CNT,CHK FROM ( ------------------------------------------------------------------------ SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P01' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P01' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P02' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS ,COUNT(*) CNT FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND A.PAYOFF < 10 AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P03' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P03' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P04' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P04' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P05' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P05' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P06' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P06' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P07' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P07' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P08' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P08' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P09' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P09' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P10' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P10' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P11' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P11' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P12' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 0 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, CD,CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P12' )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'P13' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),2) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.MOT_NO,MAX(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)- MIN(A.INTRO_RUN_TM) AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.MOT_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q01' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS, COUNT(TMS) CNT, 1 CHK FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD IN('002', '003') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q02' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('110','120') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q03' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('995','996','997') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q04' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD IN('001','002','004','007','008','010') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q05' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,ROUND(SUM(A.STAR_TM)/COUNT(A.STAR_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q06' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,ROUND(SUM(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)/COUNT(A.INTRO_RUN_TM),2) AS CNT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q07' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),3) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO,SUM(A.TIME_DIFF)/2000 AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' AND A.RANK IN( 2,3) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,'Q08' CD,NVL(B.CNT,0) CNT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,TMS,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE VOIL_CD IN('125','140','150','210','220','999') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) ) WHERE STND_YEAR BETWEEN ? - 2 AND ? ORDER BY CD,STND_YEAR,TMS
